description: A delicious, rich, creamy chicken stroganoff with a beautiful smokey flavour. Accompanied with buttery cabbage and apple, just perfect for winter.
keywords: Chicken Stroganoff w Sauteed Cabbage & Apple
name: Chicken Stroganoff w Sauteed Cabbage & Apple Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: CABBAGE INSTRUCTIONS  Meanwhile whilst Chicken is simmering, heat Butter in the large flat pan on medium/high heat, add Cabbage (it seems a lot, but does cook down) saute for about 5 minutes or until softened slightly, add Apple and saute for a further 3 minutes or until Cabbage and Apple are cooked, season with Salt & Pepper - serve immediately and enjoy.
